title: JGDHealth - EMR, IVR, CRM & Mobile Apps
description:
Transform your healthcare practice with JGDHealth. We’re more than a Healthtech platform. We have the ability to integrate with any existing software providing operational stability and prepare you for future.
From individual practices to publicly listed healthcare institutions, we have transformed a diverse range of clients. 
Our Major Offerings:
- AI-Powered IVR
- Integrated EMR
- Google Review Management
- Mobile Applications
- Patient Communications - Email, SMS, WhatsApp
- Lead Management
